name: Bob's Cat Challenge
description: Oh no! The cats have gotten loose - and it's up to our hero, Bob the Yeti, to collect them all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® Celeron® Processor B820, 1.70GHz or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: 2nd Gen Intel® HD Graphics or better Storage: 1047 MB available space
